评论概述: Vibrant and Stylish Men's Hawaiian Shirt Set for a Casual Summer Look!
评论详情: I recently purchased the OYOZONE Men's Hawaiian Shirt and Short Set, and overall, I am quite pleased with my purchase. This two-piece outfit offers a laid-back and stylish look, perfect for any casual summer occasion.  Let's start with the shirt - the vibrant prints and colors are eye-catching and give off a fun tropical vibe. The satin fabric feels smooth and comfortable against the skin, making it a breathable choice for hotter days. The short sleeves allow for easy movement, and the button-down design adds a touch of versatility to the overall look.  The shorts, which come as part of this set, are equally stylish and comfortable. They fit well and offer ample room to move around freely. The draw string ensures a snug fit without digging into the skin, providing all-day comfort. Although it could have been a longer string. The breathable fabric allows for proper airflow, helping to keep me cool during the summer heat.  However, the reason I deducted one star from my rating is due to a minor flaw in one of the pockets. Unfortunately, upon inspection, I noticed a small hole in one of the pockets. While it doesn't affect the overall functionality or appearance of the outfit, it is worth noting this defect. I hope it was an isolated occurrence and not a common issue with the product.  Aside from this, the OYOZONE Men's Hawaiian Shirt and Short Set is a great choice for those looking for a casual and stylish ensemble. It's perfect for beach parties, barbecues, or even just a relaxed outing with friends. The print options available are impressive, offering a wide variety to suit different tastes and preferences.  In terms of fit, I found the sizing to be accurate. Ordering based on the provided size chart ensured a comfortable and well-fitting set. The quality of the fabric is decent, though not as premium as expected, but considering the price point, it's understandable.  Overall, despite the minor flaw in one of the pockets, I am satisfied with my purchase. This vibrant and stylish Men's Hawaiian Shirt and Short Set from OYOZONE is a great addition to my summer wardrobe. Be sure to check the pockets thoroughly upon receiving your item, but don't let this deter you from experiencing this fashionable and casual outfit for yourself!

评论概述: I Never Want to Take This Off
评论详情: I absolutely adore this outfit. I've been getting deep into matching sets recently, and this one is a slight cut above the others that I've found. Because I'm preparing myself for a trip to see wifey, who lives overseas, I'll bring this along.  First, let's talk about the design and color. Black and gold might be a generic color pairing, but this outfit really makes good use of it. I especially love the gold trimming. Also, the black is a DEEP black. Like a jet black.  The shirt fits perfectly. There's no tightness around the waist or underneath the arms, and I got this outfit in a slightly smaller size than I should have. The shorts are a LITTLE snug, but I think that I will adjust to that over time.  I don't know what the outfit is made from (maybe satin?), but it's buttery soft. I feel like a king wearing it. I definitely want to encourage anyone who likes outfits like this to order this and give it a try. It definitely won't disappoint.

This is a very silky soft set. It keeps my husband cool in the summer, even on a hot southern day. The gold accents are what makes this set unique and one of a kind. It can be worn casual or fashionable. The size is true so order usual size.

评论概述: Good looking shirt and shorts set that is perfect for hot weather.
评论详情: I ordered this OYOZONE Men's Hawaiian Shirt and Short Set for myself and I really think it looks and fits good on me. The material the set is made from is very lightweight, silky smooth, breathable and the wine-red color is deep, rich and good looking.  It is a blend of 98% polyester and 2% spandex but has no stretch to it even though it contains a little spandex in the blend. The shirt and shorts fit true to size for me and sits comfortably with just the right amount of bagginess that I prefer in this type of clothing. This is the perfect set to wear during the summer and I am happy with it.

Two-piece outfit that combines silky material with a unique pattern in several nice colors.  Fits Perfectly.  The pattern on the outfit, particularly the gold wavy bordering around the shirt and shorts, is a nice feature and reminiscent of historic gold relief found in buildings or temples.

评论概述: this outfit was meant for me - i love it
评论详情: I have daydreamed about the perfect summer outfit designs that would combine a silky material with another pattern that was completely outside that visual approach. I have to look no further with this great looking two piece outfit from the Oyozone brand. This is available in several nice colors which made it hard for me to choose which on i wanted to order. I honestly love all of the color options and had narrowed it down to either the red or green. I went with the green because it is less common within a silky material. I like the dark shade of the green used with that making it a great pairing with the shiny effect of the green. I like how the medium size i ordered fits like a medium with it being more of a slimmer fitting affair. I like the pattern that appears as a boarder along the edges of the button down shirt then around the leg region of the shorts. The gold dominant color of the wavy pattern is reminiscent of a gold relief that would be around a historic building or inside a temple. I am a fan of that kind of wavy bordering in general so that is a nice feature of the shirt part of this outfit. The fact that this is a button down shirt gives you that opportunity to control the front which is beneficial in the summer heat. This is as comfortable as it looks with the inner material being kind to the skin. The outer silkiness makes it easy to move around on a couch or other furniture. You can create a slide effect when on a leather couch or other material that allows for that. This outfit definitely stands out when you wear it in public. I received several compliments on it at the store when i was grocery shopping. To conclude i am vey happy with this and recommend it for anyone who likes to add a bit of animation to their everyday clothing.

Excellent fabric. Silky, airy material that you can hardly feel against your skin. I took to wearing them as pajamas because they are so darn comfy and cool. The pattern just work really well for PJs, too. Although I could wear it around on a nice summer day and no one would know the difference.

El conjunto es espectacular, pedí talla M, mido 180cm y peso 70kg, sin embargo debo decir que la camisa es muy larga y tuve coserla a mano para que tuviera una longitud adecuada del pecho y espalda quedó excelente, muchos cumplidos además ese color va genial con el tono de piel
